parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
The King seems nice. Do you know what’s actually going on though? \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
Well, I spoke to the King he said that the invasion has something to do - \|\|\^
- with the Princes of Rinsar. I had heard rumours that there were issues - \|\|\^
- between the three princes. I'm guessing it must be true. \|\|\^
Fair enough but why would they want to invade Lamar? \|\|\^
I’m not exactly sure Cedric but if I had the answers I would tell you. - \|\|\^
- However, news has spread that Deer was invade as well. I recieved word - \|\|\^
- from Randaltown that the Randalls have been imprisoned. Soldiers are also - \|\|\^
- being given an ultimatum of joining the enemy or face execution. \|\|\^
If these armies invaded Deer as well how do we know they wont head here - \|\|\^
- next? If they are actively recruiting soldiers to fight their cause - \|\|\^
Well, the King informed me that the kingdoms of Hyde, Payne and Grispon - \|\|\^
- have all declared war on this enemy. Rinsar has also claimed to be going - \|\|\^
Sounds good but what do we do now? \|\|\^
Well, I informed the King that I will be going to help save the Randalls - \|\|\^
- I want you to stay in Teslon. \|\|\^
No! I want to go with you. We should stick together. \|\|\^
Brother you’ll have your chance I promise. Just stay in Teslon, for me. \|\|\^
Urgh fine I’ll stay but I’m not happy about this. \|\|\^
Thank you, Brother. Well, I guess I should be on my way. We'll see each - \|\|\^

Hi, what can I do for you? \|\|\^
We are here to let you know that you have friends in Hyde. We will help - \|\|\^
Yes. We need to know what you know about the invaders. \|\|\^
I’m sorry I don’t know much about them. \|\|\^
Be careful who you talk to here. Some people will dispose of you at a - \|\|\^
You obtained Lord Orlebar's Entry in the Journal.
You obtained Lord Craon's Entry in the Journal.

Cedric? Cedric wake up! Are you okay? \|\|\^
Yes, I’m okay, I’m good your grace. \|\|\^
I was attacked. There was someone in my chamber. They came and tried to - \|\|\^
Do you know who the attacker was? \|\|\^
No, I don’t. They were disguised. \|\|\^
I should have known something like this was going to happen. \|\|\^
Well, put it this way, not everyone in Hyde is happy about you staying here. \|\|\^
Are you talking about your advisers? \|\|\^
Some of them came to me. Some telling me to leave, some telling me to stay. \|\|\^
I see. I didn’t think they would have been so brave. But then again we - \|\|\^
- are talking about potential war. You stay here and rest, I will look - \|\|\^

Cedric Haffenden. I see you are alive and well. I would have thought that - \|\|\^
- the attack that took place in this room the last time you were here - \|\|\^
- would have scared you off for good. It’s good to see you have risen - \|\|\^
- above it all. Let me know if you need anything. \|\|\^

Lord Altard, would you like to join us? I could use some more enjoyable company. \|\|\^
No need, I won’t be long. The last two times you were here you were attacked - \|\|\^
- so I am baffled as to why you keep coming back? But it’s great you - \|\|\^
- are here. You have helped immensely in freeing the Kingdom of Hyde - \|\|\^
- from Roswell’s grip. I hope that just because of the incidents that took - \|\|\^
- place you don’t see the other advisors and I as your enemy. We merely act - \|\|\^
- in the best interest of Hyde and it’s king, sometimes the situation can - \|\|\^
- get out of hand. I hope you can find it within you to forgive us? \|\|\^
You and King Dormato enjoy your stay here. \|\|\^
